river/creek/plain/an area of level country
Wenchuan county (Tibetan: wun khron rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
Great Sichuan Earthquake (2008)
Great Sichuan Earthquake (2008)

sentences.english: In Wenchuan Earthquake, Xi'an city and Baoji city in Shaanxi Province are in areas with large epicentral distance.
sentences.chinese: 汶川地震中，陝西省西安市和寶雞市兩地處於遠震區。

sentences.english: Going among the masses to promote harmony requires carrying forward the spirit of earthquake relief work.
sentences.chinese: “深入羣衆促和諧”要弘揚汶川抗震救災精神。

sentences.english: Flags were at half mast everywhere on the day of mourning for victims of Wenchuan earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 例句汶川地震哀悼日全國降半旗誌哀。

sentences.english: In Wenchuan earthquake, Most building structures were damaged for different degrees in Mianyang city.
sentences.chinese: 汶川地震中，綿陽市大部分房屋均有不同程度破壞。

sentences.english: Wenchuan forms part of the  prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 汶川是阿壩州的一部分。

sentences.english: Medical teams of Wanli Group returned in triumph from Wenchuan earthquake-stricken area thousands of mils far.
sentences.chinese: 派遣至汶川地震災區的萬里醫療隊凱旋歸來。

sentences.english: A minute of silence was observed for the quake victims before the run.
sentences.chinese: 起跑前，全體與會者向汶川大地震遇難者默哀一分鐘。

sentences.english: Roads to Wenchuan Conuty, epicenter of the quake, were blocked by fallen rocks and debris.
sentences.chinese: 通往震中汶川的道路被震落的碎石堵住了。

sentences.english: May 13, armed police officers and men from the sea into the town of Wenchuan County Yingxiuwan.05.
sentences.chinese: 5月13日，武警官兵從水路進入汶川縣映秀鎮。

sentences.english: Chuan Wenchuan earthquake, the China Seismological Bureau has launched a plan.
sentences.chinese: 四川汶川地震發生後，中國地震局已啓動一級預案。

sentences.english: The listing of the 21 Tsing Ai cottages, among them, a small one Wenchuan.
sentences.chinese: 此次掛牌的二十一所青艾小屋當中，有一間汶川一小。

sentences.english: After the Wenchuan earthquake, the city of Shifang has entered an important stage of post-disaster reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 汶川大地震後什邡市已經進入了災後重建的重要階段。

sentences.english: Half of Asian was shaked, The whole World was Startled by the Wenchuan Earthquake on 12 May.
sentences.chinese: 12日的汶川地震讓半個亞洲震動，讓整個世界震驚。

sentences.english: A lot of new houses are being built in Wenchuan and Qingchuan.
sentences.chinese: 很多新房子正在汶川和青川地區被修建着。

sentences.english: The first news of Wenchuan earthquake was issued on net.
sentences.chinese: 汶川大地震的消息第一時間是在網上發佈的。

sentences.english: Roads to Wenchuan County, epicenter of the quake, were blocked by fallen rocks and debris.
sentences.chinese: 通往震中汶川的道路被震落的碎石堵住了。
